name: City of Antwerp
goal: The city of Antwerp wants to deliver good services to its citizens, visitors and businesses. It has competencies in the following policy fields: urban renewal/development, public infrastructure, mobility, environment, housing, employment, economy, retail and catering industry, education, youth, culture, heritage, sports, tourism, city and neighborhood maintenance, safety, police and justice, fire department, religion and worldviews, social affairs, community development, development cooperation, animal welfare, citizen services, marketing and communication, patrimony maintenance, citizen participation, finances, inter-communal services, human resources, judicial affairs, diversity, and inner-city decentralization.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- General Data Protection Regulation
- Public Procurement Directive
- EC Annual work programme
- Action Plan eGovernment 2016-2020
